credit_line: Gift of Phyllis Levine in memory of Dr. Ernest Sharo
title: Brooch
provenance: Given to the donor by her uncle Dr. Ernest Sharo, who acquired it in Germany in 1947 and gave it to her.
description: An almost rectangular piece, carved with a rose surrounded by  lily of valley and foliage; the back mounted with a bar clasp
name: Brooch
